00537 inline CImage::RowIterator1bp CImage::Row1bp(UINT32 i)
00538 {
00539         return RowIterator1bp(m_Image.ppAllScanLines[i+m_Image.Origo.y],GetMinX()+m_Image.Origo.x, GetMaxX()+m_Image.Origo.x);
00540 }

00545 }

00599 inline UINT32 CImage::GetPixel(int x, int y) const
00600 {
00601         // For 24 b/p: R+G*256+B*256*256
00602         // adjust origo offset
00603         x += m_Image.Origo.x;
00604         y += m_Image.Origo.y;
00605         UINT16 border=m_Image.BorderSize;
00606 
00607         if ((x>=-border) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+border) &&
00608                 (y>=-border) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+border))
00609         {
00610                 switch(m_Image.Bits){
00611                 case 1:
00612                         return (((m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x>>3])&(0x80>>(x&0x7)))!=0);
00613                 case 8:
00614                         return (m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x])&0xff;
00615                 case 24:
00616                         return ((*(UINT32*)(&(m_Image.ppMatrix[y][3*x])))&0xffffff);
00617                 default:
00618                         ostringstream ost;
00619                         ost << "CImage::GetPixel() Only implemented for 1,8 and 24 bit per pixels" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00620                         CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00621                         return 0;
00622                 }
00623         }
00624         else
00625         {
00626                 ostringstream ost;
00627                 ost << "CImage::GetPixel(" << x << "," << y << ") Outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00628                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00629                 return 0;
00630         }
00631 }
00632 
00633 inline UINT32 CImage::GetPixel(const CPoint2D<int>& Pos) const
00634 {
00635         // For 24 b/p: R+G*256+B*256*256
00636         // adjust origo offset
00637         int x = Pos.GetX()+m_Image.Origo.x;
00638         int y = Pos.GetY()+m_Image.Origo.y;
00639         UINT16 border=m_Image.BorderSize;
00640 
00641         if ((x>=-border) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+border) &&
00642                 (y>=-border) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+border))
00643         {
00644                 switch(m_Image.Bits){
00645                 case 1:
00646                         return (((m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x>>3])&(0x80>>(x&0x7)))!=0);
00647                 case 8:
00648                         return (m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x])&0xff;
00649                 case 24:
00650                         return ((*(UINT32*)(&(m_Image.ppMatrix[y][3*x])))&0xffffff);
00651                 default:
00652                         ostringstream ost;
00653                         ost << "CImage::GetPixel() Only implemented for 1,8 and 24 bit per pixels" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00654                         CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00655                         return 0;
00656                 }
00657         }
00658         else
00659         {
00660                 ostringstream ost;
00661                 ost << "CImage::GetPixel" << Pos << " Outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00662                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00663                 return 0;
00664         }
00665 }

00668 {
00669         // For 24 b/p: R+G*256+B*256*256
00670         // adjust origo offset
00671         int x = Pos.GetX()+m_Image.Origo.x;
00672         int y = Pos.GetY()+m_Image.Origo.y;
00673         UINT16 border=m_Image.BorderSize;
00674 
00675         if ((x>=-border) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+border) &&
00676                 (y>=-border) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+border))
00677         {
00678                 switch(m_Image.Bits){
00679                 case 1:
00680                         return (((m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x>>3])&(0x80>>(x&0x7)))!=0);
00681                 case 8:
00682                         return (m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x])&0xff;
00683                 case 24:
00684                         return ((*(UINT32*)(&(m_Image.ppMatrix[y][3*x])))&0xffffff);
00685                 default:
00686                         ostringstream ost;
00687                         ost << "CImage::GetPixel() Only implemented for 1,8 and 24 bit per pixels" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00688                         CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00689                         return 0;
00690                 }
00691         }
00692         else
00693         {
00694                 ostringstream ost;
00695                 ost << "CImage::GetPixel" << Pos << " Outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00696                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00697                 return 0;
00698         }
00699 }
00700 
00701 inline bool CImage::SetPixel(int x, int y, UINT32 Color)
00702 {
00703         // returns false if outside image or if b/p is not supported
00704         x += m_Image.Origo.x;
00705         y += m_Image.Origo.y;
00706         UINT16 border=m_Image.BorderSize;
00707 
00708         if((x>=-border) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+border) &&
00709                 (y>=-border) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+border))
00710         {
00711                 switch(m_Image.Bits){
00712                 case 1:
00713                         Color ? (m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x>>3] |= (0x80>>(x & 0x7))) : 
00714                                         (m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x>>3] &= (0xff7f>>(x & 0x7)));
00715                         return true;
00716                 case 8:
00717                         m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x]=(UINT8)Color;
00718                         return true;
00719                 case 24:
00720                         *((UINT32*)&(m_Image.ppMatrix[y][3*x])) = ((*((UINT32*)&(m_Image.ppMatrix[y][3*x])))
00721                                 & 0xff000000) | (Color & 0x00ffffff);
00722                         return true;
00723                 default:
00724                         ostringstream ost;
00725                         ost << "CImage::SetPixel() Only implemented for 1,8 and 24 bit per pixels" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00726                         CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00727                         return false;
00728                 }
00729         }
00730         else
00731         {
00732                 ostringstream ost;
00733                 ost << "CImage::SetPixel(" << x << "," << y << ") Outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00734                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00735                 return false;
00736         }
00737 }
00738 
00739 inline bool CImage::SetPixel(const CPoint2D<int>& Pos, UINT32 Color)
00740 {
00741         // returns false if outside image or if b/p is not supported
00742         // adjust origo offset
00743         int x = Pos.GetX()+m_Image.Origo.x;
00744         int y = Pos.GetY()+m_Image.Origo.y;
00745         UINT16 border=m_Image.BorderSize;
00746 
00747         if((x>=-border) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+border) &&
00748                 (y>=-border) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+border))
00749         {
00750                 switch(m_Image.Bits){
00751                 case 1:
00752                         Color ? (m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x>>3] |= (0x80>>(x & 0x7))) : 
00753                                         (m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x>>3] &= (0xff7f>>(x & 0x7)));
00754                         return true;
00755                 case 8:
00756                         m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x]=(UINT8)Color;
00757                         return true;
00758                 case 24:
00759                         *((UINT32*)&(m_Image.ppMatrix[y][3*x])) = ((*((UINT32*)&(m_Image.ppMatrix[y][3*x])))
00760                                 & 0xff000000) | (Color & 0x00ffffff);
00761                         return true;
00762                 default:
00763                         ostringstream ost;
00764                         ost << "CImage::SetPixel() Only implemented for 1,8 and 24 bit per pixels" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00765                         CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00766                         return false;
00767                 }
00768         }
00769         else
00770         {
00771                 ostringstream ost;
00772                 ost << "CImage::SetPixel" << Pos << " Outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00773                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00774                 return false;
00775         }
00776 }

00792                                         (m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x>>3] &= (0xff7f>>(x & 0x7)));
00793                         return true;

00795                         m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x]=(UINT8)Color;

00817 inline UINT32 CImage::GetPixelFast(int x, int y) const
00818 {
00819         // no range check
00820         // returns for 24 b/p: R+G*256+B*256*256
00821         // adjust origo offset
00822         x += m_Image.Origo.x;
00823         y += m_Image.Origo.y;
00824         switch(m_Image.Bits){
00825         case 1:
00826                 return (((m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x>>3])&(0x80>>(x&0x7)))!=0);
00827         case 8:
00828                 return (m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x])&0xff;
00829         case 24:
00830                 return ((*(UINT32*)(&(m_Image.ppMatrix[y][3*x])))&0xffffff);
00831         default:
00832                 ostringstream ost;
00833                 ost << "CImage::GetPixelFast() Only implemented for 1,8 and 24 bit per pixels" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00834                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00835                 return 0;
00836         }
00837 }
00838 
00839 inline UINT32 CImage::GetPixelFast(const CPoint2D<int>& Pos) const
00840 { 
00841         // no range check
00842         // returns for 24 b/p: R+G*256+B*256*256
00843         // adjust origo offset
00844         int x = Pos.GetX()+m_Image.Origo.x;
00845         int y = Pos.GetY()+m_Image.Origo.y;
00846         switch(m_Image.Bits) {
00847         case 1:
00848                 return (((m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x>>3])&(0x80>>(x&0x7)))!=0);
00849         case 8:
00850                 return (m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x])&0xff;
00851         case 24:
00852                 return ((*(UINT32*)(&(m_Image.ppMatrix[y][3*x])))&0xffffff);
00853         default:
00854                 ostringstream ost;
00855                 ost << "CImage::GetPixelFast() Only implemented for 1,8 and 24 bit per pixels" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00856                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00857                 return 0;
00858         }
00859 }

00867         int y = Pos.GetY()+m_Image.Origo.y;
00868         switch(m_Image.Bits) {
00869         case 1:
00870                 return (((m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x>>3])&(0x80>>(x&0x7)))!=0);
00871         case 8:
00872                 return (m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x])&0xff;
00873         case 24:
00874                 return ((*(UINT32*)(&(m_Image.ppMatrix[y][3*x])))&0xffffff);
00875         default:
00876                 ostringstream ost;
00877                 ost << "CImage::GetPixelFast() Only implemented for 1,8 and 24 bit per pixels" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00878                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());

00882 
00883 inline void CImage::SetPixelFast(int x, int y, UINT32 Color)
00884 {
00885         // no range check
00886         // returns false if outside image
00887         // adjust origo offset
00888         x += m_Image.Origo.x;
00889         y += m_Image.Origo.y;
00890         switch(m_Image.Bits){
00891         case 1:
00892                 Color ? (m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x>>3] |= (0x80>>(x & 0x7))) : 
00893                                 (m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x>>3] &= (0xff7f>>(x & 0x7)));
00894                 return;
00895         case 8:
00896                 m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x]=(UINT8)Color;
00897                 return;
00898         case 24:
00899                 *((UINT32*)&(m_Image.ppMatrix[y][3*x])) = ((*((UINT32*)&(m_Image.ppMatrix[y][3*x])))
00900                         & 0xff000000) | (Color & 0x00ffffff);
00901                 return;
00902         default:
00903                 ostringstream ost;
00904                 ost << "CImage::SetPixelFast() Only implemented for 1,8 and 24 bit per pixels" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00905                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00906                 return;
00907         }
00908 }
00909 
00910 inline void CImage::SetPixelFast(const CPoint2D<int>& Pos, UINT32 Color)
00911 {
00912         // no range check
00913         // returns false if b/p is not supported
00914         // adjust origo offset
00915         int x = Pos.GetX()+m_Image.Origo.x;
00916         int y = Pos.GetY()+m_Image.Origo.y;
00917 
00918         switch(m_Image.Bits){
00919         case 1:
00920                 Color ? (m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x>>3] |= (0x80>>(x & 0x7))) : 
00921                                 (m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x>>3] &= (0xff7f>>(x & 0x7)));
00922                 return;
00923         case 8:
00924                 m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x]=(UINT8)Color;
00925                 return;
00926         case 24:
00927                 *((UINT32*)&(m_Image.ppMatrix[y][3*x])) = ((*((UINT32*)&(m_Image.ppMatrix[y][3*x])))
00928                         & 0xff000000) | (Color & 0x00ffffff);
00929                 return;
00930         default:
00931                 ostringstream ost;
00932                 ost << "CImage::SetPixelFast() Only implemented for 1,8 and 24 bit per pixels" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00933                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00934                 return;
00935         }
00936 }
00937 
00938 inline void CImage::SetPixelFast(const CPoint2D<INT16>& Pos, UINT32 Color)
00939 {
00940         // no range check
00941         // returns false if b/p is not supported
00942         // adjust origo offset
00943         int x = Pos.GetX()+m_Image.Origo.x;
00944         int y = Pos.GetY()+m_Image.Origo.y;
00945 
00946         switch(m_Image.Bits){
00947         case 1:
00948                 Color ? (m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x>>3] |= (0x80>>(x & 0x7))) : 
00949                                 (m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x>>3] &= (0xff7f>>(x & 0x7)));
00950                 return;
00951         case 8:
00952                 m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x]=(UINT8)Color;
00953                 return;
00954         case 24:
00955                 *((UINT32*)&(m_Image.ppMatrix[y][3*x])) = ((*((UINT32*)&(m_Image.ppMatrix[y][3*x])))
00956                         & 0xff000000) | (Color & 0x00ffffff);
00957                 return;
00958         default:
00959                 ostringstream ost;
00960                 ost << "CImage::SetPixelFast() Only implemented for 1,8 and 24 bit per pixels" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00961                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00962                 return;
00963         }
00964 }

01055 
01056 inline void CImage::SetOrigo(UINT16 x, UINT16 y)
01057 {
01058         SetOrigo(CPoint2D<int>(x,y));
01059 }
01060 
01061 inline void CImage::SetOrigo(const CPoint2D<int>& Pos)
01062 {
01063         m_Image.Origo.x=Pos.GetX();
01064         m_Image.Origo.y=Pos.GetY();
01065         if (m_ROIActive==true)
01066         {
01067                 m_ROIUpperLeft  -= Pos;
01068                 m_ROILowerRight -= Pos;
01069         }
01070 }
01071 
01072 inline bool CImage::SetROI(const CPoint2D<INT32>& UL, const CPoint2D<INT32>& LR)
01073 {
01074         if ((UL.GetX()>=LR.GetX()) || (UL.GetY()>=LR.GetY()))
01075         {
01076                 ostringstream ost;
01077                 ost << "CImage::SetROI() UL " << UL << " greater than LR " << LR << 
01078                         " in at least one of the dimensions" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
01079                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
01080                 return false;
01081         }
01082         // we check with the MinX, MaxX, MinY and MaxY without ROI
01083         INT32 MinXNoROI=-m_Image.Origo.x;
01084         INT32 MinYNoROI=-m_Image.Origo.y;
01085         INT32 MaxXNoROI=m_Image.Width-m_Image.Origo.x;
01086         INT32 MaxYNoROI=m_Image.Height-m_Image.Origo.y;
01087         if ((UL.GetX()<MinXNoROI) || (UL.GetY()<MinYNoROI) || 
01088                     (LR.GetX()>MaxXNoROI) || (LR.GetY()>MaxYNoROI))
01089         {
01090                 ostringstream ost;
01091                 ost << "CImage::SetROI() UL " << UL << " or LR " << LR << 
01092                         " outside image dimensions: " << CPoint2D<int>(GetMinX(),GetMinY()) <<
01093                         " - " << CPoint2D<int>(GetMaxX(),GetMaxY()) << IPLAddFileAndLine;
01094                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
01095                 return false;
01096         }
01097         m_ROIActive=true;
01098         m_ROIUpperLeft=UL;
01099         m_ROILowerRight=LR;
01100         return true;
01101 }
01102 
01103 
01104 } // end namespace ipl
